title: Bard's Lore All Makes Sense Now!
body:
Evil army wants powerful artifact.
Villagers defend artifact.
Old man reveals that artifact shoots out powerful magical energy that can instantly disintegrate single enemy targets.
Bard of course does not like that such an OP item exists and essentially makes it disappear from existence.

Bard is the reason why Death Fire Grasp no longer exists.

Hi! you must be new here! Allow me to tell you of the battle of the Armored Bear.

The great Troll Lord Zileas and his right hand of Darkness Xelnath fought the noble battle to prevent abominations such as Armored Bears from entering the league. But after the long and arduous battle against the Evil Morello and the Fallen Parrot God IronStylus, Zileas had to accept his loss and allow Volibear to enter the league.

ah, my bad. It's been a long time ago. I know zileas had a comrade in arms, but I can't remember the details.

It would need a special interaction with Irelia.

Balance shouldn't rest around ARAM games.  But, Tanky DPS has a strong foot hold in this type of game now with the high amount of gold.  Many accumulate a lot of HP from RoA or various Def./HP gear.  With out the DFG and less crit on some items Tanky DPS can usually mow over a team.  I know the goal was to get rid of burst DPS but the game is getting super boring when you are only chipping away at a champ that just stacks HP/Def items.  And with the nerf to many of the burst mages (Zil, Arhi, Viegar etc.) you can really see a lose in what Morello perceives as balanced.
So what ur saying is burst mages cant down tanks instantly? Absurdity!! Someone call the balance team!
I'm still trying to wrap around the idea ADC's can take out tanks almost as fast as a top lane bruiser :L

ADC's are supposed to take out tanks faster than bruisers. ADC's are supposed to be the highest DPS role while also being the one with the least defensive options + squishiness.

The problem is simply tanks drop too fast, it's a problem with pen items really.

well I see 2 options to fix this. 

A) make penetration resistance Items on top of everything else to make the game even more complicated.

B) nerf penetration items to make it possible to tank properly again.

knowing riot, they would go with A.
I can see this pushing Maokai further over the edge as the dominant top champion.
Sion is the dominant top champion.

Him as well. I didn't think that many people knew about how strong Sion top is. But both him and Mao do different things, but essentially yes. They both deal decent damage with moderate CC and can take quite a large amount of punishment. No other top laners are quite as reliable when it comes to those aspects.

So true... I was probably being a doofus one time, but a Maokai literally mopped top lane with me when I was playing as Gnar :/
Was I a doofus or is Maokai just that good?

Maokai is a Gnar counter actually. I was unfortunate enough to find that out on the wrong side of it :/

His Twisted Advance stops you if you try to Hop away and his knockup stops you if you try to hop on him. His poke is better than your extremely short ranged auto attacks and the occasional boomerang and he can take more of it with his passive that heals for just about as much as you can do with 5 boomerangs.

It's a really bad matchup. His ult also semi-counters MegaGnar as does his knockup/knockback (cuz it cancels Hop, so you're stuck at a range as a melee MegaGnar :/).

Oh wow...
Alright, that makes sense. Only problem is that now I NEVER see a Maokai anymore...
Really odd. Probably the whole mobility thing that's making things difficult for the poor tree.

I never see him in normals either. Maybe he's just not that fun to play? But I still see him in ranked all the time. Same for Sion really.

But as for the mobility thing, Twisted Advance actually fits really well into this mobility meta as a counter-mobility skill. No matter how much they move, they will get rooted and have a tank in their face.

Sounds like Cho'Gath against a squishy immobile target :/
